name: Again (itch) (SKRWED)
description:
Space or Up - Jump

D - Dash

P - Pause

A platformer game in the form of an infinite runner (option to enable/disable infinite runner to "story" in the pause menu).

Made using C++ with the SDL2 library. The source code is also included for download, if wanted. My first game. It does things. Feedback below plz.

Music and Art by SKRWED(me). Non-copyright so feel free to use them. Credit would be nice, tho.
